modName: Nightingale Armor Male Woodlands Camo with or without Cape
summary: Camoflage Retexture for Male Nightingale Armor (Capeless)
descriptionHtml:
This is a camoflage retexture for the male Nightingale armor with out cape. 

This mod is dependant on:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1560]Capeless nightingale[/url]
 
 I assume no responsiblity for the removal of the cape or any mesh work,Gilead Maerlyn did that work I just changed the texture of the visible armor. If the creator of Capeless Nighingale is not okay with this alteration I am more than happy to remove this mod and replace it with the default.

Installation
Simply extract the Data folder in the Skyrim folder (typically C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim)

Currently Male only depending on how well this is recieved will depend on the female mod. I do appreciate all constructive opinions as this is my first retexture.  

11/29/11 Per Request: Drogun
Added download option Armor with Cape.
author: Conejito

files.name: Nightingale Armor Camo Retexture with Cape
files.fileName: Nightingale Armor Camo Retexture with Cape-1979-0-2-0.zip
files.changelogHtml: Added a Armor with Cape download option that requires no other mods to function.
